data.title: Elder Center
data.meta_description: The Fire Keepers Elder Center provides a place for community elders to come together. The Center is open daily from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.
data.text:
15372 K Road, Mayetta, KS 66509 | P. 785-966-0040

The Fire Keepers Elder Center Building open hours are 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., Monday through Friday.

The Fire Keepers Elder Center provides a place for community elders to come together.

The Center is open daily from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., Monday through Friday. The facility is equipped with a game room with pool tables, a craft room, a sitting room for visiting and tv watching, access to gym equipment, and other scheduled activities. Each summer the program coordinates a trip for the Elders to attend the annual Potawatomi Gathering.

August 2024 Activity Calendar

Approximately 120 nutritious lunches are served to community members each day. Meal delivery is available to home-bound seniors on the Reservation . Each month a special birthday meal is prepared to celebrate senior birthdays. Potawatomi Tribal Fire Department provides free blood pressure and sugar level checks starting at 11:15 a.m. each day.

August 2024 Lunch Menu â€“ Lunch served from 11:00 a.m. to 12:30 p.m.
